name: Iron Dagger
description: A small dagger made of iron, perfect for close-quarters combat.
looks: The iron dagger has a short and slim blade, with a simple hilt made of wood. It has a sharp edge and a slightly curved shape.

special_weapon_skills.dagger_proficiency: Grants a bonus to Dagger proficiency when equipped.

name: Fire Staff
description: A staff imbued with the power of fire, capable of channeling destructive fire spells.
looks: The Fire Staff is made of polished oak and has intricate carvings of flames along its length. It has a red gemstone set at the top, which glows with an intense fiery light when the staff is activated.

name: Silver Ring
description: A simple silver ring, suitable for everyday wear.
looks: The silver ring is plain and smooth, with a polished surface. It has a small, round shape with no engravings or embellishments.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from pure silver.
looks: The silver sword has a slender and elegant design, with a double-edged blade and a hilt adorned with intricate silver engravings. It glimmers with a faint silver glow.

name: Fiery Sword
description: A blazing hot sword imbued with the power of flame.
looks: The Fiery Sword has a long, curved blade made of gleaming steel. The hilt is wrapped in red leather and adorned with intricate flame designs. When wielded, the blade emits a constant stream of flames.

special_effects.flaming_strike: Chance to inflict burning on target with each hit

name: Steel Chestplate
description: A heavy and durable chestplate made from strong steel.
looks: The steel chestplate is a solid armor piece that covers the chest and upper torso. It has intricate engravings and reinforced metal plating. The chestplate features adjustable straps for a secure fit.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a straight, double-edged blade that is approximately three feet long. The hilt is made of leather-wrapped iron, providing a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill while wielding the sword.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Sturdy gauntlets made from steel, providing protection for the hands and fingers.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of solid steel that covers the hands and fingers. They have a textured surface and reinforced knuckles for added protection.

name: Steel Greatsword
description: A massive, two-handed sword made of steel.
looks: The steel greatsword has a long, broad blade with a sharp edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip, and the pommel is adorned with a decorative emblem.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword that is sharp and durable.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single edge and a crossguard. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Diamond Sword
description: A powerful and durable sword made from pure diamond.
looks: The Diamond Sword has a gleaming blade made entirely of diamond. The hilt is made from a combination of diamond and gold, with intricate engravings along the handle.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Sturdy gauntlets made of steel to protect the hands in combat.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of thick steel plates with padded leather lining on the inside. They cover the entire hand and extend up to the forearm.

name: Fireball Wand
description: A wand that harnesses the power of fire, allowing the user to cast powerful fireball spells.
looks: The Fireball Wand is made of dark mahogany wood with intricate carvings of flames along its length. At the tip, there is a crystal orb that glows with a fiery red light.

special_weapon_skills.wand_proficiency: Increases damage and casting speed when using wands.
